sentence: “Dave McCormick has been quoted bashing populism, celebrating skilled immigration and even warning about the potential drawbacks of an ‘America First’ mindset.
author: Cassandra Fairbanks
title: Establishment GOP PA Senate Candidate David McCormick Hosts Fundraiser With Dominion PR Rep

sentence: Pennsylvania Republican Senate candidate Dave McCormick opposes increasing the federal minimum wage and wants to keep it at its current level of $7.25 an hour, set in 2009, when it was raised from $6.55.
author: Josh Israel
title: Super-Rich GOP Senate Candidate Says Keep Minimum Wage At $7.25

sentence: Oz is the antithesis of everything that made Trump the best president of my lifetime—he’s the farthest thing from America First & he’d be very bad for PA https://t.co/kuTo4pp53U — Sean Parnell (@SeanParnellUSA) April 9, 2022 Dave McCormick, who is a former George W. Bush administration official and is married to Dina Powell, a former deputy national security adviser to Trump, was also in the running for his endorsement but did not get it even though he leads Oz, according to recent polls.
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
title: Conservatives react very badly to Donald Trump’s endorsement of Dr. Oz
